sourcesContent:
import React,{ Component } from 'react'; import Media from 'react-bootstrap/Media' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import '../App.css'; const axios = require('axios'); class Movie extends Component{ state={estandar:{}, actore:["a","b","c","d","b","c","d","b","c","d","b","c","d","b","c","d","b","c","d"], escritore:["a","b","c","d","b","c","d","b","c","d","b","c","d","b","c","d","b","c","d"], directore:["a","b","c","d","b","c","d","b","c","d","b","c","d","b","c","d","b","c","d"], video:{} } async componentDidMount(){ let number = this.props.pelicula.split("/")[1] const response = await axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/"+number+"?api_key=466c19159235f9ce92fe9604a953aba2&language=es") this.setState({estandar:response}); console.log("MAMA") const response2 = await axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/"+number+"/credits?api_key=466c19159235f9ce92fe9604a953aba2") let i=0; let actores=[]; let escritores=[]; let directores=[]; for(i=0; i<3;i++){ actores.push(response2.cast[i]) } this.setState({actore:actores}) response2.crew.forEach(element => { if(element.department=="Writing"){ escritores.push(element) } else if(element.department=="Directing"){ directores.push(element) } }); this.setState({escritore:escritores}) this.setState({directore:directores}) console.log("XDDDDDDDD") console.log(this.state.estandar) } render () { return(
{this.state.estandar.data.title} ({this.state.estandar.data.release_date.split("-")[0]}) {this.state.estandar.data.vote_average}/10

{this.state.estandar.data.vote_count}

{this.state.estandar.data.overview}

Director: {this.state.directore.map( (director) => director.name+" " )}
Writers: {this.state.escritore.map( (escritor) => escritor.name+" " )}
Stars: {this.state.actore.map( (actor) => actor.name+" " )}

) } }; export default Movie;
